author: Phil Ward
description: An agave-based old-fashioned with a wonderful hit of smokiness from the mezcal.Like many cocktails, Philip's original recipe (of 45 ml Reposado tequila, 15 ml Mezcal, 7.5 ml Agave syrup and 1 dash Angostura bitters) has morphed with chocolate bitters now favoured by many in place of Angostura (as per the recipe above). If using a "sweeter" style glycerine-based (rather than alcohol-based) chocolate bitters, such as Fee Brothers, or you have a bone-dry palate, then consider reducing the agave syrup to 5ml.
name: Oaxaca Old-Fashioned

recipeInstructions.text: STIR tequila with three ice cubes in a glass
Add other ingredients and STIR with more ice
Top up ice and STIR some more
